response.answer_text: CLAT is the Law Entrance test for students who wants to take admission in National Law Universities across the country for the course BA LLB. The fullform of CLAT is Common Law Admission Test. The BA LLB course is a 5 years integrated course. CLAT does not provide admission to 3 years Law Course. Also CLAT is conducted for Post graduate degree too, i.e. LLM Hope this answer clears your concern ;)
